TopicTitle: Infinite loading time when reverting to VAB from ocean

Articles.Content: I have a 980 pro, so most of the loading times were pretty fast in the game, but when I tried reverting to VAB from splashdown it just stopped. The progress bar went to around 2/3 and froze for 10+ minutes, after which I killed the process through task manager.
I had same bugs when I returned from launch site to VAB, edited craft and tried to launch it from launchpad again. Game was stuck on loading screen and I stop it by task manager
